entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
